title: 2 Pieces Dry Diamond Core Drill Bits 1/4" 6mm 5/8-11 Thread Vacuum Brazed Diamond Hole Saw for Porcelain Tile Ceramic Marble Brick Granite Drilling
features: [Size] --2pcs 1/4"(6mm), diamond height 10mm, total length 60mm, 5/8-11 thread Connection,Grit #35/40,Max RPM:11000rpm

[Wide Application] --Worked great for dry drilling holes through porcelain tile shower walls, ceramics, bathroom tile,marble granite,stone,masonry,brick,stucco,counter top with ease,Using water could prolong the lifetime

[Vacuum Brazed Technology] --Using vacuum brazed technology ,which increases resistance to temperature and friction,to make the diamond particles better attach to the core steel,imporve the performance and lifetime.High-quality core steel body helps to be more efficient and durable, not easy to deform

[High Performance] --The Hole saw has two slots that allowed the drilled plug to be pushed out with a screwdriver.Special U-groove tooth shape and chip removal design of the tile hole cutter creates a high sharpness,you could drill smoothly with no broken edges
[Machine] --angle grinder (direct connection) or electric drill (with adapter )
description: You could use our diamond tipped drill bits for bathroom remodel,includes installing faucet,handles,shower plumbing,shower doors,conduit,grab bar,brackets in porcelain for both hooks and glass shelves,hang towel fixtures.or thread power wires through cement,make holes in the bottom of plant pots,or install garbage disposal button, soap dispenser and filtered water through a granite counter. Using our bit for cutting the accurate holes without cracking, Cool it with water while drilling could prolong the lifetime. USER TIP: For a better finish and longer duration of the porcelain tile drill bit.you could start on a slight angle at its lowest speed for better control, then slowly move the drill back to perpendicular. The average life of the tile hole saw depends on several factors,including the type of aggregate and material, its thickness/hardness ,proper cooling and use. This is the ideal diamond drill bit for rock, DIY ,ceramic workers, construction workers, general contractors and tradesmen. All our products are subjected to strict quality tests.
